00010 import modelManagement.exceptions.PortNotFoundException;

00015 import Simulink.Inport;

00029 public class SimulinkEcoreCreator {
00030         
00031         protected SimulinkFactory factory;
00032         protected Model theModel;
00033         protected HashMap<String, System> systemRepository;
00034         protected HashMap<UUID, ProtoObject> repository;
00035         
00036         public SimulinkEcoreCreator(SimulinkFactory aFactory) {
00037                 factory = aFactory;
00038                 systemRepository        = new HashMap<String, System>();
00039                 repository                      = new HashMap<UUID, ProtoObject>();
00040         }
00041 
00042 
00043         public Model newModel(String modelName) {
00044                 theModel = factory.createModel();
00045                 theModel.setName( modelName );
00046                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( theModel );
00047                 return theModel;
00048         }
00049 
00050 
00051         private void setUUIDAndAddToRepository(ProtoObject object) {
00052                 UUID uuid = UUID.randomUUID();
00053                 object.setUuid(uuid.toString());
00054                 repository.put(uuid, object);
00055         }
00056 
00057 
00058         public Model getTopElement() {
00059                 return theModel;
00060         }
00061 
00062 
00063         public System addRootSystem(String name) {
00064                 System aSystem = obtainSystem(name);
00065                 theModel.setRoot(aSystem);
00066                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( aSystem );              
00067                 return aSystem;
00068         }
00069 
00070 
00071         /*
00072          * If the system is not in the repository it will be created
00073          */
00074         private System obtainSystem(String name) {
00075                 System aSystem = findSystem( name );
00076                 if ( aSystem == null ) {
00077                         aSystem = newSystem(name);
00078                 }
00079                 return aSystem;
00080         }
00081 
00082 
00083         private System newSystem(String name) {
00084                 System aSystem = factory.createSystem();
00085                 aSystem.setName(name);
00086                 aSystem.setSimulinkName(name);
00087                 systemRepository.put(name, aSystem);
00088                 theModel.getParts().add(aSystem);
00089                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( aSystem );              
00090                 return aSystem;
00091         }
00092 
00093         
00094         public System findSystem(String name) {
00095                 return systemRepository.get( name );
00096         }
00097 
00098         public static Port findPortWithin(String portName, System aSystem) {
00099                 Port port = findOutportWithin(portName, aSystem);
00100                 if ( port == null ) {
00101                         port = findInportWithin(portName, aSystem);
00102                 }
00103                 return port;
00104         }
00105         
00106         public static Outport findOutportWithin(String portName, System aSystem) {
00107                 Outport port = null;
00108                 EList<System> targetSystems = 
00109                         createSystemListWithParentAndFirstLevelChldren(aSystem);
00110                 for (System sys : targetSystems ) {
00111                                 port = findOutportInSystem( portName, sys );
00112                                 if (port != null) { return port; }
00113                 }
00114                 return port;
00115         }
00116 
00117         public static Inport findInportWithin(String portName, System aSystem) {
00118                 Inport port = null;
00119                 EList<System> targetSystems = 
00120                         createSystemListWithParentAndFirstLevelChldren(aSystem);
00121                 for (System sys : targetSystems ) {
00122                                 port = findInportInSystem( portName, sys );
00123                                 if (port != null) { return port; }
00124                 }
00125                 return port;
00126         }
00127 
00128         private static EList<System> createSystemListWithParentAndFirstLevelChldren(
00129                         System aSystem) {
00130                 EList<SystemReference> childrenList = aSystem.getChildren();
00131                 EList<System> targetSystems = getAllTargets( childrenList );
00132                 targetSystems.add(aSystem);
00133                 return targetSystems;
00134         }
00135 
00136 
00137         private static EList<System> getAllTargets(EList<SystemReference> childrenList) {
00138                 BasicEList<System> result = new BasicEList<System>( childrenList.size() );
00139                 for (SystemReference aRef : childrenList) {
00140                         result.add( aRef.getTarget() );
00141                 }
00142                 return result;
00143         }
00144 
00145 
00146         private static Outport findOutportInSystem(String portName, System aSystem) {
00147                 return findPortInList( portName, aSystem.getOutports());
00148         }
00149 
00150         private static Inport findInportInSystem(String portName, System aSystem) {
00151                 return findPortInList( portName, aSystem.getInports());
00152         }
00153         
00154         private static <IOPort extends Port> IOPort findPortInList(String portName, 
00155                         EList<IOPort> ports) {
00156                 for (IOPort aPort : ports) {
00157                         if (aPort.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(portName)) {
00158                                 return aPort;
00159                         }
00160                 }
00161                 return null;
00162         }
00163 
00164         
00165         public SystemReference addSystem(PropertyList pList) {          
00166                 
00167                 String name             = pList.getName();
00168                 String instanceName = pList.getInstanceName();
00169                 System parent           = pList.getParent();
00170                 SystemReference sysRef = addSystemInstance(name, parent, instanceName);         
00171                 return sysRef;
00172         }
00173         
00174         private SystemReference addSystemInstance(String name, System parent,
00175                         String instanceName) {
00176                 
00177                 System aSystem = obtainSystem(name);
00178                 SystemReference reference = factory.createSystemReference();
00179                 reference.setName(instanceName);
00180                 reference.setParent(parent);
00181                 reference.setTarget(aSystem);
00182                 parent.getChildren().add(reference);
00183                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( reference );            
00184                 return reference;
00185         }
00186 
00187 
00188         /*
00189          * comply with older API, probably unused
00190          */
00191         public System addSystem(String name, System parent, String instanceName) {
00192                 SystemReference sysRef = addSystemInstance(name, parent, instanceName);
00193                 return sysRef.getTarget();
00194         }
00195         
00196         /*
00197          * comply with older API, probably unused
00198          * name and instanceName are the same
00199          */ 
00200         public System addSystem(String name, System parent) {
00201                 return addSystem(name, parent, name);
00202         }
00203 
00204 
00205         public Inport addInPort(String name, System parent) {
00206                 Inport inport = factory.createInport();
00207                 parent.getInports().add( inport );
00208                 inport.setName(name);
00209                 inport.setParent(parent);
00210                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( inport );               
00211                 return inport;
00212         }
00213 
00214 
00215         public Outport addOutPort(String name, System parent) {
00216                 Outport outport = factory.createOutport();
00217                 parent.getOutports().add( outport );
00218                 outport.setName(name);
00219                 outport.setParent(parent);
00220                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( outport );              
00221                 return outport;
00222         }
00223 
00224         public Line addLineBetween(String name, System source, System destination, 
00225                         System parent) {
00226                 Outport outport = source.getOutports().get(0);
00227                 Inport inport = destination.getInports().get(0);
00228                 return addLine(name, outport, inport, parent);
00229         }
00230         
00231         public Line addLine(String name, Port source, Port destination, 
00232                         System parent) {
00233                 Line line = factory.createLine();
00234                 line.setName(name);
00235                 line.setSource(source);
00236                 line.setDestination(destination);
00237                 parent.getLines().add(line);
00238                 this.setUUIDAndAddToRepository( line );
00239                 return line;
00240         }
00241         
00242         public void addLines(ArrayList<LineInfo> lines) throws PortNotFoundException {
00243                 String name;
00244                 Port srcPort, dstPort;
00245                 System parent;
00246                 for ( LineInfo lineInfo : lines ) {
00247                         name = lineInfo.getName();
00248                         parent = lineInfo.getLineParent();
00249                         srcPort = this.findPort( lineInfo.getSrcPort() );
00250                         dstPort = this.findPort( lineInfo.getDstPort() );                       
00251                         addLine( name, srcPort, dstPort, parent );
00252                 }
00253         }
00254

00256         public System findSystem(UUID uuid) {
00257                 return (System) repository.get(uuid);
00258         }
00259 
00260         public SystemReference findSystemReference(UUID uuid) {
00261                 return (SystemReference) repository.get(uuid);
00262         }
00263 
00264         public Port findPort(UUID uuid) {
00265                 return (Port) repository.get(uuid);
00266         }
00267                 
00268         public Line findLine(UUID uuid) {
00269                 return (Line) repository.get(uuid);
00270         }
